title: abundance of natural light and beautiful wood flooring.
description:
This first floor end unit is located in the peaceful Riverhill section of Village II. The courtyard provides a private entrance and wonderful space to garden or enjoy a morning coffee. Inside the spacious living room, you are greeted with an abundance of natural light and beautiful wood flooring. The open floor plan allows you to move easily around the space and the eat-in kitchen overlooks the living room. Nestled at the back of the home, the generous bedroom enjoys views of park-like surroundings. A bonus space off the bedroom, currently used as a home office, offers endless possibilities. A clean and bright full bathroom and full-size laundry complete the space. Enjoy all of this plus easy access to fabulous shopping, dining and entertainment in New Hope Boro. Walk or bike along the canal and enjoy everything Bucks County has to offer. Just minutes to Route 202 and an easy commute to Doylestown, Newtown, Princeton, and Philadelphia. The community features several swimming pools, walking trails, a clubhouse, basketball and tennis courts.

This 3 bed/1.5 bath property has amazing bones and boasts bamboo floors, a big L shaped kitchen with wood cabinets & granite countertops, and half bath on the main floor. Additionally, it has a large, clean basement with laundry and the perfect back patio for entertaining!
The three spacious bedrooms have plenty of closet space, and the upstairs hallway bathroom features a huge standup shower. Just off of Passyunk Ave, this house has a walk score of 97! Have a beer at Stogie Joe's, a croissant at Artisan Boulanger, or grab your dog a toy at Doggie Style.
Everything you need is right here. Easy commute to anywhere in the city via Snyder Station which is only a 5 minute walk. Passyunk has unbeatable walkability, energy, and endless options for foodies and shoppers alike.
Listing provided by BHHS Fox and Roach Realtors

The lower level is finished throughout and designed as an extra-large private suite with separated rooms which can easily fit a sitting area as well as a full bedroom suite with an attached powder room.

Conveniently located in the Gray’s Ferry/Point Breeze area, this address allows for easy commuting across the Schuylkill River. The neighborhood offers cool and eclectic eateries, grocery shops, local bars, and green parks. Also, a quick ride to Rittenhouse Square, Midtown, Fairmount, the Schuylkill trail, and many of Center City Philadelphia best attractions.

The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to retail stores, grocery stores, restaurants, and more! Retail stores on Rittenhouse Row include Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, Vans, Tselaine, Anthropologie, Lagos, Madewell, Outdoor Voices, Tiffany & Co., Brooklinen, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Target, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Go grocery shopping at Sue's Produce Market, Venditore by Giordano, Di Bruno Bros., Rittenhouse Market, Target, Maxx's Produce, Food & Friends, Spruce Market, Trader Joe's, and Giant. Dine out at Pietro's, Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Via Locusta, Schlesinger's, Spice Finch, Bellini, La Fontana della Citta, a.kitchen, HipCity Veg, Zama, Restaurant Aleksandar, Villekebabs & Platters, Her Place, Veda, Wilder Restaurant, Tortorice's Specialty Sandwiches, Twenty Manning, Square on Square, Friday Saturday Sunday, and Trattoria Carina. Enjoy a churro sundae at El Merkury. Pick up a loaf of bread from Metropolitan Bakery. Grab a scone at The Bakeshop on 20th. View the collection at The Mütter Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday year-round. There is so much to do in this area!
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 1710 is still listed under the Dali floor plan!

title: NEWLY RENOVATED TWO BEDROOMS AT EMERSON APARTMENTS!!
description:
EMERSON APARTMENTS
We are located in the greater northeast section of Philadelphia right off of Bustleton
Avenue with Evarts as the cross street. Our apartments are fully renovated with brand
new kitchens and bathrooms! Parking lot in the rear of the building and laundry facilities on site!
Heat, hot water and cooking gas included!
Don’t miss this opportunity to find the home you will love!
Please give us a call or send an email to schedule an appointment for a viewing.
Physical applications are on site.
You may bring along the following so you can apply the same day:
1. The application fee in the form of a money order. The
application fee is $75 for up to two applicants.
*Any adult moving in MUST be on the application.
*Must be 21 years of age or older
2. A copy of your social security card and ID is recommended.
In order to qualify for an apartment, your credit report must have no relevant
landlord tenant filings or evictions. In addition, you cannot have an arrest
record. Your income needs to be at least two - three times the cost of rent.

title: Fully Renovated 3BD/2.5BTH House for rent
description: Need to get out of Philadelphia but want to live very close to the city with easy access? Incredible amenities in suburb right outside of Philadelphia, including one of top school districts in the state: Colonial School District. Convenience of a few minutes walk to the Plymouth Whitmarsh High School, Colonial Elementary School, the Whitmarsh Elementary school and the William Jeanne's library and learning center and the brand new colonial middle school is a short distance located off of Plymouth Road in Plymouth Meeting. Located within minutes of a bike/running path that encircles the mega sports complex of VICTORY FIELDS. The private back yard backs DIRECTLY up to MILES PARK open space area of the fields. The attractive looking colonial house sits in a fabulous neighborhood that is neighbor friendly, family friendly, yet superb access to philadelphia's great surrounding suburbs that enjoy great night life, top foodie areas, restaurants, pubs, historic areas, etc. such as Conshohocken, Ambler, Fort Washington, Plymouth Meeting, Blue Bell, Collegeville, Oaks, Gwynedd, Valley Forge, Main Line, Lower Merion, King of Prussia, Norristown, East Norriton, Bridgeport, and of course minutes drive to CHESTNUT HILL, Mount Airy, Manayunk, Fairmount, Art Museum Area, Center City Philadelphia. In the past we have rented to families, couples, and Single people alike. Nearby hospitals- Bryn Mawr, Penn Presbyterian, CHOP, Pennsylvania Hospital, Chestnut Hill hospital. Our location has Septa Regional Rails (formerly known as R5) in several locations within minutes of our house including Conshohocken, Spring Mill Station, Chestnut Hill East and Chestnut Hill West, Miquon, Ambler Rail Station, Ivy Ridge Station, etc... These trains are a quick trip to Philadelphia, 30th street station, all suburban lines, etc... There is also a Septa Bus Route nearby. Just minutes to routes 76, 676, PA Turnpike (I-276) , I- 476 (blue route), 309, 422. The location also provides close proximity to numerous beautiful parks, playgrounds, library, bike trails. You can bike ride to the rail to trail bike trail access which is all along the river (SRT) with one end into Philadelphia Boat house Row and Art Museum to all the way through Valley Forge and the Perkiomen trail. It is beautiful. You can also ride to the Wissahickon Park (Valley Green) and access Biking trails into Philly or hike the trails. Convenient to many area hospitals Abington Hospital, Children's Hospital of Philadelphia, Lankannau Hospital, Chestnut Hill Hospital, Jefferson University Hospital, Hannehman Hospital, Roxborough Memorial Hospital. Close to many great schools: Springside Chestnut Hill Academy, Lasalle College High School, Germantown Academy, Mount Saint Joseph Academy, Chestnut Hill College, Villanova, St. Joe's University, Haverford College, Cabrini College, Ursinus College, Arcadia College Rosemont College, etc... The house has 3 Bedrooms, One Full Bathroom, TWO HALF Bathrooms. Hardwood Flooring throughout. First Floor has living room, dining room, (Fireplace that currently is used as decorative), kitchen, Family room/Den overlooking backyard and MILES PARK, Half Bathroom. First Floor has Breezeway connected to side of house where garage is connected. Basement is Unfinished with separation of utility area. Full Washer and Dryer located on utility side of basement and plenty of room for storage. Unfinished room with walk out exit to back yard. Second story has Three Bedrooms, one FULL HALL BATHROOM, One HALF BATHROOM CONNECTED TO ONE OF THE BEDROOMS. Three bedroom closets. Hardwood flooring. CENTRAL AIR CONDITIONING THROUGHOUT. GAS HEAT. ONE CAR GARAGE. BACKS UP TO PRIVATE AREA OF MILES PARK. BEAUTIFUL SETTING. Great neighborhood. Pets Might be acceptable with pet deposit, etc. each case is individually discussed.

title: ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today!
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on the National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment near Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors. Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of Philadelphia. Enhanced Penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair Accessible Apartments Available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: Sky Deck with 360 View, Includes Grilling Station and Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace. Wellness Floor Featuring a Yoga Studio, Cardio, Weights, TRX & Boxing. Private Dining Room with Fireplace and Serving Kitchen. Club Level with Kitchen, Billiards, Flat-Screen TVs and Large Screen. Media Room for Private Parties. Business Center with Computers, Printers, Conference Rooms with A/V Capabilities. Media Room. Full Service Concierge. Parking Garage w/ Valet Parking Option. Package Receiving. Pet Grooming Station. On Site Property Management. Elevator. Charging Stations for Electric Cars. Cold Storage for Grocery Delivery. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance. Pets Welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent. On-Site Green Drop Donation Box. ** Pricing and availability subject to change on a daily basis ** Photos are of model units ** Parking may be available for additional fee **

545 N Broad St, Philadelphia, PA 19123Welcome to Mily on Green. Designed for community, flexibility, and functionality, your new home offers spacious 2- and 3-bedroom apartments with high-end appliances, an in-unit washer/dryer, and built-in storage.
